ISSUE.TITLE: Option to copy date from an existing document
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For Proforma and also Invoice, i need the option, that in case i create a new document from scratch, to copy the data from an existing document. (All data except the document series and number). The business case is, if a document is wrong then i cancel it and then i create a new one from zero by copy-paste field by field which for multiple lines is a big pain. The idea is to copy all from a selected document and then to modify it:)
